name: Host (itch) (Valérian CHORGNON - 2D Artist)
description:
Project realized in team during a "slow game jam" within the university. We took 2 weeks to design a game with the goal of using an alternate controller. To do so, we chose to link mushrooms to the device "Makey makey" (> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rfQqh7iCcOU) to serve our purpose. 
- Host tells the fatal destiny of a parasitized insect controlled by a cordyceps (a mushroom). The parasite is controlled by a reproduction of the interior architecture of its host. 
The goal is to guide the insect as far as possible, attracted to danger like its peers. 
- I took care of the creation of the characters, including the player, the insects and the boss. I also did some concept for the main menu, the introduction and the "Game over" screen. 
If you like the project, do not hesitate to listen the soundtrack of our Sound designer! (> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yPjQqLYPInc)
